mapper.select: SELECT i.*, ic.category, u.uid as user_uid, u.email as user_email, u.display_name as user_display_name, u.photo_url as user_photo_url FROM incidents i LEFT JOIN incident_categories ic ON i.id = ic.incident_id LEFT JOIN users u ON i.user_id = u.uid WHERE i.id = #{id}

SELECT i.*, ic.category, u.uid as user_uid, u.email as user_email, u.display_name as user_display_name, u.photo_url as user_photo_url FROM incidents i LEFT JOIN incident_categories ic ON i.id = ic.incident_id LEFT JOIN users u ON i.user_id = u.uid WHERE LOWER(i.company_name) = LOWER(#{companyName}) ORDER BY i.date DESC

SELECT DISTINCT i.*, ic.category, u.uid as user_uid, u.email as user_email, u.display_name as user_display_name, u.photo_url as user_photo_url FROM incidents i LEFT JOIN incident_categories ic ON i.id = ic.incident_id LEFT JOIN users u ON i.user_id = u.uid WHERE LOWER(i.title) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')) OR LOWER(i.company_name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')) OR LOWER(ic.category) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')) ORDER BY i.date DESC
